Success made by you Every page tells your story At navflow we work closely with you to develop your perfect website, we know all business have different personalities and we believe this should be the same for your website
Content delivery this is the part where we understand your needs
Step 1
Upon conformation we will set this step aside to understand your business.
Step 2
We will have meetings to develop a better understanding of how you picture your site
Step 3
In this step the development of your product will start, this means we will constantly work with you to create a working product
Step 4
This is where we will deploy the solution or extend the product period to incoperate any changes you want
Our packages What do we offer? Since we are still only a start-up company we offer two packages. These packages are open to being expanded in the future.
BASIC £150.00
  • Five-page website
  • Three banner designs
  • Cross-browser compatibility
  • Money back guarantee
  • Mobile responsive
START-UP £300.00
  • Ten-page website
  • Six banner designs
  • Cross-browser compatibility
  • Money back guarantee
  • Mobile responsive
FAQ Frequently asked questions
?
What is a startup? it means we are a newly formed business. Even with this in mind, we still aim to give 100% to each project that comes our way
?
Will this effect us? No, we only take on projects that we're capable of seeing through to the finish
?
Do we have experience? Combined we have over five years of working in different ends of development
?
What if something goes wrong? If something goes wrong with your product we will aim to fix it, if the project is complete we will still offer support
?
What sort of support is offered post deployment? Support is offered within reason. Changes are not free, however, bug fixes are (if they were our fault).
?
What if I need something changed? This will cost, however, since the project is already finished, the price will vary based on the scale of the request
